snippet.title: #fame hollywood -​​ Johnny Depp and Amber Reunite!!
snippet.description:
Heart-breaking news for all Johnny Depp fans! The Pirates of the Caribbean fame star Johnny Depp finally reunites with Amber Heard despite recent rumors about their marriage troubles. On a trip to Australia while shooting for the next ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ flick, Johnny suffered from a hand injury during the shoot but little did he know that Amber would surprise him with a visit to Australia.

John Christopher "Johnny" Depp II (born June 9, 1963) is an American actor, producer, and musician. He has won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild award for Best Actor. Johnny Depp is an award-nominated actor known for his portrayal of odd-ball characters including Captain Jack Sparrow in the Pirates of the Caribbean.
